name: Smart Budgeting
description: Finno uses machine learning algorithms to create personalized budgets that help users achieve their financial goals.

name: Investment Tracking
description: Track your investments in real-time and receive customized recommendations on how to optimize your portfolio.

name: Automated Savings
description: Set up automated savings plans and watch your money grow without lifting a finger.
